smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'MainViewModel' with '22' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'MainActivity' with '15' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Object 'Companion' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside objects is set to '11'
Object 'AppPrefs' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside objects is set to '11'

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function stringToSequenceStep appears to be too complex.
The function migrate appears to be too complex.
The function migrate appears to be too complex.
The function migrate appears to be too complex.
The function onCreate appears to be too complex.
The function onOptionsItemSelected appears to be too complex.
The function installShortcutWatcher appears to be too complex.
The function fromJson appears to be too complex.
The function onViewCreated appears to be too complex.
The function execute appears to be too complex.
The function onBindViewHolder appears to be too complex.
The function onBindViewHolder appears to be too complex.

smells.name: ComplexInterface
smells.description: An interface contains too many functions and properties. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. An interface should have one responsibility. Split up large interfaces into smaller ones that are easier to understand.

instances.message: The interface SequenceDao is too complex. Consider splitting it up.

smells.name: MethodOverloading
smells.description: Methods which are overloaded often might be harder to maintain. Furthermore, these methods are tightly coupled. Refactor these methods and try to use optional parameters.

instances.message: This method is overloaded too many times.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function migrate is nested too deeply.
Function migrate is nested too deeply.
Function fromJson is nested too deeply.
Function execute is nested too deeply.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class MainActivity is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function updateImage has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: MemberNameEqualsClassName
smells.description: A member should not given the same name as its parent class or object.

instances.message: A member is named after the class object. This might result in confusion. Please rename the member.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: DataClassContainsFunctions
smells.description: Data classes should mainly be used to store data and should not have any extra functions. (Compiler will automatically generate equals, toString and hashCode functions)

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (if (dir == "..") File(currentDir!!).parentFile else File(dir)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: if (dir == "..") File(currentDir!!).parentFile else File(dir)

Parentheses in ((it.type == SequenceStepType.UDP || it.type == SequenceStepType.TCP) && it.port in 1..65535) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: (it.type == SequenceStepType.UDP || it.type == SequenceStepType.TCP) && it.port in 1..65535
Parentheses in (other is AppData && other.app == app && other.name == name) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: other is AppData && other.app == app && other.name == name

smells.name: ReturnCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

instances.message: Function execute has 5 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function onHandleIntent has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function onBindViewHolder has 4 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.

smells.name: UnusedPrivateMember
smells.description: Private member is unused.

instances.message: Function parameter address is unused.
Function parameter size is unused.
Function parameter count is unused.
Function parameter pattern is unused.
Function parameter sleep is unused.
Function parameter host is unused.
Function parameter port is unused.

smells.name: ExpressionBodySyntax
smells.description: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

instances.message: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class ViewHolder defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class ViewHolder defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
